fields.name: Busy Mind (Passive):
fields.value:
Immune to ~~occupy~~ roleblock and redirect.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Link Minds (Night):
fields.value:
Allows another player to talk to you tonight. Others will not be able to see who you target. Failed if player is reaped by the (1787) ToL Reaper.
- Cannot target King.
- Doesn't count as visiting

fields.name: Conduit (Night, 2 Uses):
fields.value:
Allow 2 players to speak to each other tonight. You will be able to hear them. Others will not be able to see who you target.
- Cannot target King.
- Doesn't count as visiting
